statements: SELECT * FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_title, revenue FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE ad_type = 'Banner';
SELECT ad_id, ad_date, ad_title FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends ORDER BY ad_date DESC;
SELECT ad_title, revenue FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE ad_placement = 'Homepage' ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, revenue, ad_date FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, revenue, ad_type, ad_placement, ad_date FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE ad_id = 1 ORDER BY ad_date DESC, revenue ASC
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_type, ad_date FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE revenue > 5000 AND ad_placement = 'Homepage'
SELECT ad_title, revenue, ad_type FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE ad_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY revenue DESC, ad_id ASC
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, ad_type, ad_date FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE ad_type IN ('Banner', 'Video') AND revenue >= 2000 ORDER BY ad_id DESC
SELECT ad_id, ad_title, revenue, ad_placement FROM AdvertisingRevenueTrends WHERE revenue < 1000 OR ad_type = 'Popup' ORDER BY ad_title ASC
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue;
SELECT ad_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue WHERE ad_name LIKE 'Ad%';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaign WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT ad_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT ad_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE ad_name LIKE 'S%' AND revenue BETWEEN 500 AND 2000;
SELECT * FROM advertising_campaign WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01' AND end_date <= '2022-12-31' ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT ad_name, revenue, campaign_name FROM advertising_revenue JOIN advertising_campaign ON ad_id = campaign_id WHERE revenue > 5000;
SELECT ad_name AS 'Advertisement Name', SUM(revenue) AS 'Total Revenue' FROM advertising_revenue GROUP BY ad_name HAVING SUM(revenue) > 10000;
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue_trends;
SELECT id, advertiser_name, revenue_amount FROM advertising_revenue_trends ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, start_date, end_date FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000;
SELECT campaign_id, ad_id, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100 ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC;
SELECT id, advertiser_name, revenue_amount, revenue_date FROM advertising_revenue_trends WHERE advertiser_name LIKE 'ABC%';
SELECT * FROM advertising_revenue_trends;
SELECT id, advertiser_name, revenue_amount FROM advertising_revenue_trends ORDER BY revenue_amount DESC;
SELECT ad_id, clicks, impressions, conversion_rate FROM ad_performance WHERE clicks > 100;
SELECT campaign_name, total_budget, campaign_status FROM advertising_campaigns WHERE total_budget > 5000 ORDER BY campaign_name;
SELECT SUM(revenue_amount) AS total_revenue, AVG(revenue_amount) AS avg_revenue FROM advertising_revenue_trends WHERE revenue_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM ad_revenue;
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, revenue FROM ad_revenue;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, total_budget FROM ad_campaign;
SELECT advertiser_name, industry FROM advertiser;
SELECT ad_id, campaign_id, date, clicks, sales FROM ad_performance;
SELECT * FROM ad_revenue LIMIT 10;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ad_revenue WHERE ad_cost > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, revenue FROM ad_revenue ORDER BY revenue DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT advertiser_name, industry, country FROM advertiser WHERE industry LIKE '%Tech%';
SELECT ad_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, revenue FROM advertising_revenue
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000
SELECT * FROM ad_performance WHERE impressions > 5000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT ad_name, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE ad_type = 'Banner'
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE revenue > 1000 ORDER BY revenue DESC
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_type, revenue FROM advertising_revenue WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' ORDER BY ad_name
SELECT client_name, industry FROM ad_client WHERE industry = 'Technology' ORDER BY client_name
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' AND end_date > '2022-08-31'
SELECT ad_id, SUM(clicks) AS total_clicks, SUM(revenue) AS total_revenue FROM ad_performance GROUP BY ad_id HAVING total_clicks > 1000 ORDER BY total_revenue DESC
